title: [3.116.1, Android] SKGLView throws often an abort upon exit on Android
body:
### Description

In our game GnollHack, we are seeing Sentry reports that SKGLView crashes upon app exit on Android. Other platforms work fine. The stack trace is as follows:

```
libc
+0x0705fc
abort

libc++
+0x07d328
<unknown>

libc++
+0x07bdf4
<unknown>

libc++
+0x07c36c
<unknown>

libc++
+0x07c310
std::terminate

libc++
+0x0a3064
std::__1::thread::~thread

libEGL
+0x030b6c
<unknown>

libEGL
+0x015ed4
android::egl_cache_t::terminate

libEGL
+0x016eac
android::egl_display_t::~egl_display_t

libEGL
+0x01ac84
<unknown>

libc
+0x071190
__cxa_finalize

libc
+0x075884
exit

libmonosgen-2.0
+0x220258
<unknown>

<unknown>
0x7187a74df4
<unknown>
```

This suggests that the GLThread or another GL related thread is still in a state that it needs to be aborted upon program exit. We've tried to clean SKGLView in many ways in advance, but the experience is that the crashing problem becomes then only more severe, so this may be a problem within SkiaSharp and SKGLView implementation on Android.

However, the SKGLViews are not even active or visible anymore, as they are in the GamePage, which already has been removed from view and possibly garbage collected. But something's been potentially left lingering on the GL side, so perhaps some thread-specific clean up from SKGLView has not fully worked out or is missing entirely.

### Code

https://github.com/hyvanmielenpelit/GnollHackMAUIEasyBuild/tree/420-69


### Expected Behavior

No abort crash at app exit.

### Actual Behavior

On upon exiting the app, the app crashes at abort from a GL related thread.

### Version of SkiaSharp

3.116.0 (Current)
